class Agent.Agent(x, y, myGenome, grid)¶

Bases: object

Fall()¶

Fall methode, that looks if the Agent shall fell If so, it makes it fall by changing its positions

Jump()¶

Jump methode, that looks if the Agent wants to jump and if it can. If so, it then performs the action by changing its positions

  • Agent (the) –

Return type
